name: image-stitch
description: Stitch images together efficiently, support streaming, for node.js and web

scripts.test:browser: npm run build:docs && tsc tests/browser.test.ts --outDir dist --module ES2022 --target ES2022 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --skipLibCheck && node --test dist/browser.test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:browser
scripts.coverage: npm run build && c8 --reporter=lcov --reporter=text node --test dist/*.test.js
